dashboard.title: Welcome to Dashboard
dashboard.description: This is your dashboard content area. You can add your widgets, charts, and other components here.

alert.title: AI Results Disclaimer
alert.description: Please be aware that the responses generated by this AI chat system may contain inaccuracies, errors, or outdated information. Artificial intelligence systems, while powerful, are not infallible and can produce incorrect or misleading content. The AI may hallucinate information or provide answers that seem plausible but are factually incorrect. It is strongly recommended that you verify any critical information through independent sources or professional consultation. Do not rely solely on AI-generated responses for important decisions, medical advice, legal matters, or financial planning. Always exercise critical thinking and cross-reference information from multiple reliable sources.
